Description: Interact with Microsoft Flight Simulator right from your Stream Deck!

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.toggle.Name: Generic Button
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.toggle.Tooltip: This button can trigger an event and display the current status of a selected variable.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.conditional.toggle.Name: Conditional Button
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.conditional.toggle.Tooltip: Triggers one of two specified events based on whether a set condition for a variable is met.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.switch.Name: Generic switch
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.switch.Tooltip: A two or three-position switch. Can display current state and toggle on press.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.gauge.Name: Generic gauge
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.gauge.Tooltip: Graphical display of a specified variable. You can set limits and customize the appearance.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.dial.Name: Generic dial
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.dial.Tooltip: Displays a specified variable, increases or decreases the value via knob rotation, and triggers an additional event on knob press.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.dualdial.Name: Dual dial
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.dualdial.Tooltip: Displays two variables simultaneously, increases or decreases the selected variable via knob rotation, switches between variables on knob press.

com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.radio.Name: Generic Radio
com.rvoronov.msfsdock.generic.radio.Tooltip: Displays active and standby frequencies, adjusts integer and fractional parts of the standby frequency, swaps frequencies on knob double-press.
